tool.name: filter DANTE_LTR transposamble elements
tool.command: Rscript ${__tool_directory__}/clean_ltr.R --gff3 '$dante_ltr' --reference_sequence '$reference' --output output --cpu 10 && mv output_clean.gff3 $dante_ltr_clean && mv output_RM_lib.fasta $rm_lib
tool.help: This tool takes output from DANTE_LTR search identifies good quality transposable elements. Good quality TE are considered those which does not have any cross-similarity between distinct lineages. Output from this tool is a annotation in GFF3 fromat and non-redundant library of elements for custom RepeatMasker search.
